Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 59th/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Pulaski, 63rd, Cicero and Midway: due to, street blockage near 59th/Kilbourn

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute near Irving Park/Broadway
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park rrtd EB via Irv Pk, Sheridan, West Sheridan & Pine Grove; WB via Marine Drive, Sheridan, West Sheridan & Irv Pk due to blockage nr Irv Pk/B'way.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Irving Park/Broadway.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Irving Park, Sheridan, West Sheridan and Pine Grove.
  • Westbound buses will operate via Marine Drive, Sheridan, West Sheridan and Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Northbound Reroute near Irving Park/Broadway
ShortDescription: Northbound 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, West Sheridan, Sheridan and Broadway due to street blockage near Irving Park/Broadway.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Broadway, West Sheridan, Sheridan and Broadway due to street blockage near Irving Park/Broadway.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
